title.narrative: USAID redacted this field in accordance with the exceptions outlined in the Foreign Aid Transparency and Accountability Act of 2016.

description.narrative: Objectives for Afghanistan: Handling pre- and post-harvest quality improvements for fresh fruit, to meet modern market requirements. Linking farmers with traders, and traders with domestic and international markets. Facilitating the export of selected fresh and dry fruits to regional international markets. Improving the performance of new and existing businesses.
USAID redacted this field in accordance with the exceptions outlined in the Foreign Aid Transparency and Accountability Act of 2016.
